documentation.text:
@notice Interface for EigenVerify proof verification
 @dev EigenVerify is used to produce and validate proofs of correctness for computations used in market resolution
@dev Mapping to track authorized verifiers (operators that can generate proofs)
@notice Add or remove an authorized verifier (operator)

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes calldata) pure returns (struct EigenVerify.DataSpec memory)
tuple(type(string storage pointer),type(string storage pointer),type(uint256),type(string storage pointer))

argumentTypes.typeString: tuple(type(string storage pointer),type(string storage pointer),type(uint256),type(string storage pointer))

documentation.text: @notice Event emitted when a verifier is added or removed

IEigenVerify.metadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.26+commit.8a97fa7a"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"proof","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"dataSpec","type":"bytes"}],"name":"verify","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"valid","type":"bool"},{"internalType":"string","name":"result","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"EigenVerify is used to produce and validate proofs of correctness for computations used in market resolution","kind":"dev","methods":{"verify(bytes,bytes)":{"params":{"dataSpec":"Encoded data specification containing data sources, query details, timestamps","proof":"Encoded proof containing data source hash, computation code hash, output result hash, and signature"},"returns":{"result":"The resolved result as a string (e.g., \"YES\", \"NO\", or the actual outcome)","valid":"Whether the proof is valid"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"verify(bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"Verify a proof of correctness for a computation"}},"notice":"Interface for EigenVerify proof verification","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/interfaces/IEigenVerify.sol":"IEigenVerify"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"contracts/interfaces/IEigenVerify.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6fcfd92d1b6507c4d38196c4dd165c30d0b033328af8b36ca89887f3de615b15","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://04946e89b24f057ba090c35e4ec4a5699c4e1159e1e4395314d7687e959d11fb","dweb:/ipfs/QmSMxghaDCxnr7urd4gZ1iargod5ZrG9ot87ZtC4ya45Xj"]}},"version":1}
